settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and access app information.

login.title: Sign in to enable reminder notifications!
login.description1: When you sign in, you enable personalized notifications such as vaccine reminders, medications, and other important care for your pet. Never miss an important date and keep your pet healthy.
login.description2: If you don't have an account yet, sign up now and start enjoying all benefits!

profile.deleteDescription: You are about to delete your account, including registered pets and vaccines. This action cannot be undone.

pets.emptyState: Register your pets to keep track of them more easily
pets.deleteDescription: You are about to delete this pet. This action cannot be undone.

vaccines.deleteDescription: You are about to delete this vaccine. This action cannot be undone.

images.savePermissionError: The app does not have permission to save files on your phone
